author: paperliss
content: Can someone please explain to me is https://ethresear.ch/t/executable-beacon-chain/8271 happening for sure? Also is it happening "within the next few weeks" as the block put it realistic?

author: sky.cactus
content: Beacon chain is live.  Executable beacon chain is not.  Getting executable beacon chain within "the next few weeks" would require a catastrophic emergency and major re-ordering of priorities.
